erv load.description: endogenous retroviruses (ERV) expression due to epigenetic derepression
erv load.name: erv load

hla genotype.description: homo- or heterozygosity in HLA class I locus (HLA-A, HLA-B or HLA-C)
hla genotype.name: hla genotype

homologous recombination deficiency.description: genetic instability due to genomic alterations in the homologous recombination (HR) DNA repair pathway
homologous recombination deficiency.name: homologous recombination deficiency

immune infiltration.description: proportion of immune/inflammatory cells in the tumour microenvironment
immune infiltration.name: immune infiltration

microsatellite instability.description: genetic instability in short nucleotide repeats (microsatellites) due to a high mutation rate as a result of abnormal DNA mismatch repair
microsatellite instability.name: microsatellite instability

mutation burden.description: total number of somatic mutations normalized to the genome size
mutation burden.name: mutation burden

neoantigen load.description: expression of antigens that are entirely absent from the normal human genome and the results of mutations acquired during carcinogenesis and progression
neoantigen load.name: neoantigen load
